FuncDef: The display bgp multicast network command displays the routes imported into the MBGP routing table by using the network command.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command is used to display all the configurations of the network command in the IPv4 multicast address family view. Routes can be imported and then advertised by MBGP only when the route prefix satisfies the following conditions:
It is specified in the network command.It already exists in the IP routing table.It is active.
